hero.description: I'm a programmer with knowledge in web design and Android & iOS development. Also, I aim towards new horizons like video game programming.

projects.title: Projects

projects.galaxy: Discord bot to improve the user experience on the server

projects.pptTitle: Rock, paper and scissors with sockets
